trans-unit.source: Represents a menu item inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenu" />控制項中的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You typically use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> to invoke a command when the menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>按一下功能表項目時叫用命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using commands with menu items, see [How to: Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).
trans-unit.target: 更多的功能表項目中使用命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將命令加入 MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> can have submenus.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>可以有子功能表。

trans-unit.source: The submenu of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> is made up of the objects within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 中子功能表的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>中的物件由組成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: It is common for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> to contain other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> objects to create nested submenus.
trans-unit.target: 它是很常見的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>來包含其他<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>物件，以建立巢狀的子功能表。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> cannot have submenus and also invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>無法具有子功能表，並同時叫用命令。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> has a submenu, the command associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>具有子功能表，與關聯的命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: When you need a control that acts as a menu header and invokes a command, use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要做為功能表標頭，並叫用命令的控制項時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示功能區控制項的應用程式功能表。

trans-unit.source: The **Open**, **Save**, and **Page Setup** items are examples of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> control.
trans-unit.target: **開啟**，**儲存**，和**版面**項目都屬於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu")
trans-unit.target: ![功能區應用程式功能表](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能區應用程式功能表")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the menu items of the Application Menu shown previously.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示先前顯示的應用程式功能表的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem> objects are hosted directly in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenu> and in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem>物件會直接在裝載<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenu>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> container object that is used to display an item from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> 容器物件，這個物件是用來顯示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 容器中的某個項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的項目是否 (或是否有資格) 是其本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" />, a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem" />, a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator" />, or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates at what level the menu item is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出功能表項目的顯示等級。

trans-unit.source: One the enumeration values that specifies at what level the menu item is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定顯示哪一個層級的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItemLevel.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItemLevel.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem.Level" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem.Level" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動的相關資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 在按下 KeyTip 或快速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在套用新的範本時，建置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationMenuItem" /> 的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序 (例如重建配置傳遞) 呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> 方法時，就會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目 (Item) 的項目 (Element)。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 準備指定項目 (Element) 以顯示指定項目 (Item)。

trans-unit.source: The container element.
trans-unit.target: 容器項目。

trans-unit.source: The item that the container is for.
trans-unit.target: 適用容器的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether to apply the style from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector" /> property to the container element of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示是否要從 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector" /> 屬性將樣式套用至指定項目 (item) 的容器項目 (element)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="container" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />; otherwise, the value returned by the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="container" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonApplicationSplitMenuItem" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSeparator" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />，則為 <see langword="false" />，否則為基底實作傳回的值。
